ygData.subject: Re: Popularity with Rivervalers
ygData.msgSnippet: Rivervale & Misty Thicket are great for xp but is a  fairly rotten place for trade skills.  Halas is much better. If you want to get rich at a young age - go
ygData.messageBody:
Rivervale & Misty Thicket are great for xp but is a fairly rotten place for
trade skills. Halas is much better. If you want to get rich at a young age
- go to Halas and learn a trade. Actually learn one so you can afford to
learn others. Otherwise you will be "poor" until you get to level 10 or 12.
Maybe 7 or 8, and hunting Blackburrow Paw is good for money - you need a
group and need to like trains <g>

Sylly
Bard of the 13th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
camped out in Qeynos on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: weya [mailto:weya@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 7:55 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Popularity with Rivervalers

From: weya <weya@...>

Greetings,

Thanks for the advice, perhaps I'll tough it out until I'm a
little
higher in level. But the lack of cash is killing me!

I have no clue what I did to give me the faction rating I
have. I
entered Rivervale as a lowly level 2. I hunted a bit in
Faydark, then
traveled to Freeport ... hunted a tiny bit there but lag
prevented me
from getting anything good really. I did manage to get to
level 2 and
get Discord. And then I made the trek to Rivervale.
Perhaps it's the
deity I chose? I can't remember which one I chose (although
I usually
chose the nicest sounding one, lol ... I love Tunare and
will chose her
if I have the choice). When I arrived I conned
"apprehensive" to every
npc but the innkeeper who conned disinterested but he won't
sell or buy
from me anyways.

I've been killing bixies and those little goblin guys ...
workers or
something like that ... anyways, they're very similar to
those annoying
green men that roam everfrost. lol

Oh, and btw, I'm a SHE not a he. <g> I had to chuckle at
the couple
posts that referenced me as a "he" or a "him". ;-) I'm the
cute little
redheaded woodelf running around Rivervale (Quellious) in
the *very*
skimpy bathing suit the EQ developers dressed me in.

Safe travels,
Wynsong
Woodelf Bard, Level 3 (and a half! ;-)
Rivervale, Quellious

--

be ready to accept anything now,
